FuncDef:
The entropy-label-capability enable command enables the entropy label capability on the egress.
The undo entropy-label-capability enable command disables the entropy label capability on the egress.
By default, the entropy label capability is disabled on the egress.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The entropy label is configured to address the severe load imbalance on a network. To configure the entropy label capability on the egress, run the entropy-label-capability enable command. Then, the entropy label capability can be enabled for tunnels to load-balance traffic.
